item.title: Making of: Trenchmaster
item.description: The story of how our favorite war criminal was made.

item.title: Nodespace
item.description: The arcane art of connecting two things. Sometimes more.

item.title: Getting info in people's heads
item.description: Documentation: Everyone loves having it, few people love making it. The history of NTM's attempts at documentation, as well as the upcoming QMAW system.

item.title: How to handle (emotional) damage
item.description: Minecraft's damage system sucks, and in order for guns to work properly we'll have to come up with something better.

item.title: Mark 6
item.description: The hat man came to me in my dreams and showed me how to make bombs even better.

item.title: Enemy Desing
item.description: We got guns, now what do we shoot with them?

item.title: INDEX
item.description: The story of Redstone-over-Radio, and some of its future capabilities.

item.title: The NTM Design Bibble
item.description: NTM has (loosely) followed some design principles for the better part of its development, in today's yapping session we go over some of them.

item.title: Guns! Guns! Guns!
item.description: More boring yapping about how guns worked, and how they could be better.

item.title: The History Of Things That Go Boom
item.description: A little history lesson on how nuclear explosions worked, and what we can expect in the near future.

item.title: In The Matters Of Bedrock Ores
item.description: Bedrock ores are kinda dumb if you think about it - too many types, too much maximum yield, nether ores being horrendous, too little processing variety...what do?
